text: Sotirios Zarianopoulos is a Greek politician, who since 2014, has been a Member of the European Parliament, representing Greece for the Communist Partyhttp://www.europarl.europa.eu/meps/en/125090/SOTIRIOS_ZARIANOPOULOS_home.html ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:MEPs for Greece 2014–2019 Category:Communist Party of Greece MEPs Category:People from Thessaloniki
title: Sotirios Zarianopoulos
